sentences.en: -- And sad, because he missed his heavenly kindred!
sentences.cn: —— 他也很伤心, 因为他思念他在天国里的亲属!

sentences.en: Although the Southern Heavenly Gate was closer now, bends in the track hid it from sight.
sentences.cn: 南天门应该近了, 由于山峡回环曲折,反而望不见了.

sentences.en: At his touch, the common thing became sublime with heavenly music.
sentences.cn: 在他的演奏下, 普通的事物在神圣的音乐声中变得崇高起来.

sentences.en: Eliza, the shepherd's pie is heavenly.
sentences.cn: 伊莱扎, 这些馅饼真是天下美味.
不知从何处响起天籁般的音乐。

sentences.en: If you forgive men their trespasses, your Heavenly Father will also forgive you.
sentences.cn: 如果你们饶恕他们的过失, 你们的天父也必将饶恕你们的过失.

sentences.en: In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
Newton proposed that heavenly and terrestrial motion could be unified with the idea of gravity.
sentences.cn: 牛顿提出天体和地球的运动可以用万有引力来解释。
一颗星掩盖着另一颗星.

sentences.en: Solitude is delicious balm to my heart in this heavenly spot.
sentences.cn: 在这样神圣的地方,对我的心来说,幽静是珍贵的安慰.

sentences.en: That yellow splendor was in itself something supernatural and heavenly to many of the peasant women.
sentences.cn: 这种金黄色的光辉,对许多农家妇女来说,其本身就具有某种超自然的神圣的气氛.

sentences.en: That yellow splendour was in itself somthing supernatural and heavenly to many of the peasant women.
sentences.cn: 这种金黄色的光辉,对许多农家妇女来说,其本身就具有某种超自然的天上的气氛.

sentences.en: The idea of spending two weeks with him may seem heavenly.
sentences.cn: 和他一起度过两周的想法听起来似乎十分美好。

sentences.en: The natural motion of heavenly objects is circular.
sentences.cn: 天上的物体的自然运动是圆周运动.

words.tran_cn: 朝向天国的；朝向天空的
朝向天国地；朝向天空地
朝向天空地；朝向天国地
天上的；神圣的；天国似的

trans.tran_cn: 神圣的，天空的，天国的，庄严的
trans.tran_en: existing in or belonging to heaven
